column4: hey can anyone tell me how i can get more graphic features....i have enabled desktop cube and expo....but i need more features
i bet you installed linux for all the eyecandy, didnt ya? (now the seinfeldian norm- not that there's anything wrong with it)
now you can muster up all the crazy effects. although, i don't like the wobbly windows. thats just too much, i think.
